keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Pirates Begin Moving
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates eliminate all 23 Marine ships guarding Whitebeard's territory, signaling they are mobilizing for war.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Whitebeard's march toward Marine Headquarters to save Ace.

statusHistory.description: Beginning to move toward Marine Headquarters for war

description: One of the most powerful pirate crews in the world, led by Edward Newgate (Whitebeard). They are mobilizing to rescue their 2nd Division Commander, Portgas D. Ace, from execution.
jollyRoger: A skull with a white mustache and crossbones

keyMoments.title: Captain Leaves Amazon Lily
keyMoments.description: Captain Boa Hancock leaves Amazon Lily for the first time in years, placing the island in her sisters' care.
keyMoments.significance: Significant moment as the captain departs on a personal mission to help Luffy.

description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily, led by Empress Boa Hancock who is also a Warlord of the Sea. The crew consists entirely of women from the Kuja tribe.
jollyRoger: A skull with long hair and snake designs

keyMoments.title: Marine Ships Destroyed by Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: All 23 Marine ships guarding Whitebeard's territory are destroyed, confirming the Whitebeard Pirates are mobilizing.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the scale of the threat the Marines are facing.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Imprisoned at Impel Down
keyMoments.description: The Marines imprison Warlord Jinbe at Impel Down for refusing to fight Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' response to insubordination even from a Warlord.

keyMoments.title: Marines Unfrozen by Hancock
keyMoments.description: The Marines aboard Momonga's ship are restored from petrification by Hancock.
keyMoments.significance: Allows Momonga's mission to succeed and the ship to proceed.

statusHistory.description: Mobilizing forces for the Summit War against Whitebeard

description: The military sea force of the World Government, tasked with maintaining law and order throughout the world's seas. Currently preparing for war against the Whitebeard Pirates.
